alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Wayne; White (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 12 at 9:09AM CDT until August 17 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois... Little Wabash River at Carmi affecting White, Wayne and Gallatin Counties. .The river, holding steady near its crest this Friday morning, will begin to fall later today. It is forecast to fall below flood stage next Wednesday. For the Little Wabash River...including Carmi...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Wabash River at Carmi. * WHEN...Until Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 32.0 feet, Flood waters flow up McHenry slough and areas near Route 1 and 14 in Carmi begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CDT Friday the stage was 30.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:30 AM CDT Friday was 30.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late Wednesday morning and continue falling to 24.3 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
